title: What you need to know about Australia's social media ban for under-16s
description: Australia is leading the way as it prepares to ban children under the age of 16 from using social media. But the move hasn't come without controversy.
content:
Australian teenagers under 16 are set to face a world-first social media ban from 10 December. 
The legislation has left tech platforms such as TikTok and Meta scrambling to figure out how to implem… [+5707 chars]
